title: Ex-Div Reminder for ITT - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking at the universe of stocks we cover at Dividend Channel  , on 9/9/19, ITT Inc (Symbol: ITT) will trade ex-dividend, for its quarterly dividend of $0.147, payable on 10/1/19. As a percentage of ITT's recent stock price of $57.00, this dividend works out to approximately 0.26%.       In general, dividends are not always predictable; but looking at the history above can help in judging whether the most recent dividend from ITT is likely to continue, and whether the current estimated yield of 1.03% on annualized basis is a reasonable expectation of annual yield going forward. The chart below shows the one year performance of ITT shares, versus its 200 day moving average:  makeArticleAd();     Looking at the chart above, ITT's low point in its 52 week range is $44.89 per share, with $66.88 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $57.16.      In Thursday trading, ITT Inc shares are currently up about 1.7% on the day.   Click here to learn which 25 S.A.F.E. dividend   stocks should be on your radar screen »
